title: These Music-Themed Lego Sets Make Great Gifts for the Holidays
summary: Forget socks and greeting cards this year, give your family and friends a thoughtful Lego set instead.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. The holidays are officially here, so it might be time to think about the best gifts to show your love for your friends and family — especially if they are Lego fans. But, why give the same old Lego gifts, when you can give the gift of music-themed sets unique to the music-lover in your life? We rounded up Lego sets for the holidays from Walmart . Not only do these Lego sets display warm feelings of love, music and pop culture — like Lego Fender Stratocaster and Lego The Boombox — but they also give you the most valuable of holiday gifts: Spending time with your friends and family assembling the sets together. Shop: LEGO For The Holidays at Walmart And since it’s from Walmart, you’ll get it shipped to you for free if you’re a Walmart+ member. Otherwise, your cart has to be more than $35 to get free shipping. Not a member? You can sign up for a 30-day free trial to take advantage of everything the retailer…
